Ok, I finally defeated castle of 2.5 peaks (tevfifty).  Between time 
being frozen repeatedly and those darn generators, I had to use the 
archmage (not the mage) to save the .. wrong thought . . to defeat the 
scenario at Skirmish.  So now I am at scenario 399.  When I finish, I 
will start to work on testing my scenarios and creating new ones.  I 
will be testing them at battle level because of the nature of my team 
(1 archmage, 1 mage, and 2 clerics can handle things easier than most 
teams).

How is progress for other people working on new scenarios?
